column4: hey i'm trying to get a dmraid (fakeraid) working. i've got it working using other linux distributions so i know it's possible, but ubuntu doesn't seem to like it. when i run dmesg -ay as told to in https://help.ubuntu.com/community/FakeRaidHowto i get "mirror: Device lookup failure" in dmesg
try registering your name and identifying yourself to nickserv
